import React from 'react';
    import { Text, TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native';
    
    const Button = ({ onPress, children }) => {
      const { buttonStyle, textStyle } = styles;
    
      return (
        <TouchableOpacity onPress={onPress} style={buttonStyle}>
          <Text style={textStyle}>
            {children}
          </Text>
        </TouchableOpacity>
      );
    };
    
    const styles = {
      textStyle: {
        alignSelf: 'center',
        color: '#007aff',
        fontSize: 16,
        fontWeight: '600',
        paddingTop: 10,
        paddingBottom: 10
      },
      buttonStyle: {
          flex: 1,
          alignSelf: 'stretch',
          backgroundColor: '#fff',
          borderRadius: 5,
          borderWidth: 1,
          borderColor: '#007aff',
          marginLeft: 5,
          marginRight: 5
      }
    };
    
    export { Button };
